mapper.insert: insert into review (order_no, mem_no, option_no, review_contents, review_photo, review_photopath, star_point, reg_date) values(#{order_no}, #{mem_no}, #{option_no}, #{review_contents}, #{review_photo}, #{review_photopath}, #{star_point}, #{reg_date} now());
mapper.select: select review_no, order_no, mem_no, option_no, review_contents, review_photo, review_photopath, star_point, reg_date from review limit #{startNum}, 10
